n:feed.name: Programmes
n:feed.title: Fetch metadata about Programmes (brands, series, episodes, clips). By applying different filter restrictions this feed can be used in many ways, for example to retrieve all series belonging to a brand, all the episodes and/or clips for a specific series, or any TLEO objects for a masterbrand. Other filters permit restricting to specific formats and/or genres, and you can request specific versions (for example Signed or Audio-Described). Parameters may be combined in any way suitable for your application.
